function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited research on accuracy of people detection and inter-people distance estimation in crowds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standard comparison on common datasets for people detection and distance estimation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No analytical studies or post-processing to analyze the risk of infection distribution after people detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of statistical analysis provided for the outcome of the distance violation index","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No statistical assessment on virus spread based on distance measurements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate comparison of dnn models’ accuracy based on non-comparable ground truths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of gps data for monitoring infected individuals may raise privacy concerns and potential misuse of personal data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and machine learning to monitor public spaces may lead to increased reliance on surveillance and raise ethical concerns about privacy and consent","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing wireless signal-based human detection in public places may lead to ineffectiveness of the technology and reliance on alternative monitoring methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High r0 value for covid-19 estimated at 2-2.5 indicates rapid spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic costs of social distancing for r0<1 and r0≈2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Moderate level of social activities and economic status","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of definite solution for treatment of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective control of virus spread in public places","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in determining and predicting the number of infected and recovered individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistical analysis of spatio-temporal data from people movements can reveal high-risk zones for contagious disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extensive testing and assessment in indoor and outdoor datasets may overlook specific contagious disease transmission risks in certain environments or communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developed model for human detection and tracking may introduce privacy concerns and ethical implications, especially in public spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential misuse of ai-based social distancing monitoring for privacy invasion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for critical health and safety decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of technological challenges impacting real-time performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of infection spread and constraint efficiency","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on essential tasks and job-related travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global outbreak of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective cure or treatment for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of transmission routes for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low percentage of participants satisfied with teleworking conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergence in attitude towards teleworking between different locations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived dissatisfaction with the current form of work","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of telecommuting leading to increased health and organizational capacity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High levels of satisfaction with telecommuting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low levels of satisfaction with telecommuting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data entry errors in the measurement values","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of statistical values","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient data validation and quality control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incremento significativo del teletrabajo a nivel mundial","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transformaci&243;n en la econom&237;a debido a la presencia de la covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mejora de la calidad del aire, reducci&243;n de ruido ambiental y contaminaci&243;n lum&237;nica en la ciudad de medell&237;n","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alto porcentaje de personas en modalidad de teletrabajo","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Problems with musculoskeletal health due to teleworking conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological problems and stress associated with teleworking","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate home workspaces impacting health and productivity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Percepci&243;n negativa del teletrabajo","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aislamiento social de los teletrabajadores","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of legal framework for telecommuting","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Teleworking may lead to increased sedentary behavior and a lack of physical activity, which can contribute to poor health outcomes and increase the risk of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicts or disputes within the home environment due to teleworking can lead to increased stress and potential negative mental health outcomes, impacting the individual’s immune system and overall health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced air quality improvements could result from increased teleworking, if individuals do not take measures to maintain a healthy indoor environment, leading to potential health risks, including the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Telecommuting may lead to decreased physical activity and sedentary behavior.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
